name: elevenlabs-mcp-backend
description: Production-grade MCP server backend for ElevenLabs Agents with Supabase integration

scripts.kill-port: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on port 3000'
scripts.restart: npm run kill-port && npm run build && npm start
scripts.restart:bg: npm run kill-port && npm run build && npm run start:bg
